title: warring kingdom skins
body: just wondering what happened to the new warring kingdom skins for azir, garen and vi? I cant seem to find them in store were they limited edition or what??..{{champion:268}}

replies.body: Most of the Warring Kingdoms skin line are legacy skins that are available every year for Chinese New Year (Lunar Revel). You'll have to wait till next year to buy them.
